question:
You took your family to a nearby restaurant. You were disappointed with the meal and wish to complain to the manager. Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant.


In the letter:explain why you were at the restaurantdescribe the problemswrite about the action you want the manager to take


You do NOT need to write your own address.


Begin your letter as: Dear Sir or Madam,


You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing to complain about the meal I had with my family yesterday at your restaurant. I am a usual customer of your organization. However, I felt last day very awful and I came with my family for my daughter's birthday celebration.

I reserved one day before the seven-seater for my dinner. But when I reached your staff informed me that I had to wait 15 minutes for the availability. I adjusted with the request even though two dishes were missed when they were served and one special ice cream I ordered was also not provided instead of that they gave one another common ice cream. So I felt disappointed with the simple party I have given to my family and daughter also not satisfied.

I would like to request take some relevant actions from your end to avoid such situations and please attend to provide the right customer service as far as possible. I hope that you will consider my request and take action promptly.
